entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • WPF application does not compile anymore moving from Core 3.1 to .NET 5 (assemblies not found in refs folder) #14522
    Discussion
  • Can we provide a way to pack and distribute similar Fatjar? #8415
    Backlog
  • [blazor][net7] dotnet..js file name is missing version info #30802
    7.0.4xx

Updated

  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx
  • failed to find runtime pack #32205
  • Shared framework ships runtimeconfig.json with unwanted policy settings #32969
  • OutputPath contains double path separator leading to NU5019 in nuget pack #32971
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With .NET 8 preview 5 SDK installed, the help description for "--sc, --self-contained" option is not consistent with EN. #32753
  • .Net7 dotnet watch regression: Failed to create MSBuildWorkspace for *.fsproj #28998
  • How to build this repo from scratch on Banana Unix? #5171
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not fail dotnet watch on workspace errors #33006
    untriaged
  • Do not fail dotnet watch on workspace errors #33005
    untriaged
  • [port to main] Explicitly enable BF for WinForms and WPF in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.targets #33004
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Set PlatformName and other properties early enough in outer build #33003
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Enable interceptors compiler feature when RDG is enabled #32950
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Containers: include the registry name when pushing an image. #32919
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2192840 #32979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Validate existing suppressions and remove obsolete suppressions when re-generating suppression files #32964
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Enable error when using BinaryFormatter in GenerateResource #32981
    untriaged
  • Add warning about version/distro-specific RID assets in .NET 8+ #32970
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32975
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
